name: Reanimated Fighter
description:
A classic world, but different stories!
You, the best warrior, get ready to against the world full of danger?

[Random challenges? Amazing!]
Random maps, enemies, and rewards... check them all!

[Wisely formed team? Cool!]
The one and only key to a victory is in your strategy!

[[Idle gaming? Relaxing!]
Wake up in the morning and see your character's level gets so high! Isn't that just fantastic?

[Massive rewards? Lovin' it!]
Start your journey with massive rewards and bonuses! Summon your amazing characters!
